testcase.name: hamcrestschema

failure.message:
Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: object has missing required properties (["Name"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""} instance: {"pointer":""} domain: "validation" keyword: "required" required: ["First_Last_Name","Name","age","email"] missing: ["Name"]
but: was "{\"First_Last_Name\":[\"Bala\",\"subramaniyan\"],\"age\":27,\"email\":\"balavijay96@gmail.com\",\"\":\"Balasubramaniyan\"}"
